s: Revitalizing Berlin's culinary scene: Nice Pies' playful brand identity

Nice Pies, a new pie shop in Berlin serving delicious veggie, vegan and meat pies. We developed the brand identity and a playful mascot to accompany it. Using a bright colour palette and strong supporting typography we were able to bring some of our cheesiest puns to life.
